DOC.brief_summary: Identify the best combination of predictive variables that influence ionizing radiation dose and improved image quality through analysis and quantification of PET-CT images in simulators and patients.
DOC.brief_title: Defining PET / CT Protocols With Optimized F18-FDG (Fluorodeoxyglucose) Dose, Focusing on Reduced Radiation Dose and Improved Image Quality
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers; Both genders; Age over 18 years; Clinical indication for PETCT scan. Pregnant women; Patients who have lesions in the liver metabolically active whether primary or metastatic; Patients with movement difficulties.
